title: FOI: annex fails to autoupgrade message
body:
Test driving bleeding edge annex 7.20191114+git30-gd5ef7fec7-1~ndall+1.  Messing around in an old "papers" repository of ours (with @mih in the past)
```shell
> datalad install -d .. -s http://github.com/dandi/artwork pics/dandi-artwork
[INFO   ] Cloning http://github.com/dandi/artwork [1 other candidates] into '/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/papers/pics/dandi-artwork' 
CommandError: command '['git-annex', 'add', '-c', 'remote.origin.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/git.pymvpa.org -o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/d84472d3', '--json', '--', '/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/papers/pics/dandi-artwork', '/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/papers/.gitmodules']' failed with exitcode 1
Failed to run ['git-annex', 'add', '-c', 'remote.origin.annex-ssh-options=-o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/git.pymvpa.org -o ControlMaster=auto -S /home/yoh/.cache/datalad/sockets/d84472d3', '--json', '--', '/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/papers/pics/dandi-artwork', '/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/papers/.gitmodules'] under '/home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/papers'. Exit code=1.
  Git is older than version 2.22 and so it has a memory leak that affects using unlocked files. Recommend you upgrade git before unlocking any files in your repository.
git-annex: Repository /home/yoh/proj/pymvpa/papers is at unsupported version 5. Automatic upgrade failed!
```
and the only thing I wanted is to add submodule... (which it has done)
